attributes.action: Admit that 7/7 was an inside job
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please admit that 7/7 was an inside job.

If anyone does not believe that this is the case then please do look at all the research documented on this website

http://www.julyseventh.co.uk/

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
